summary: Implements a distributed service that loads node‑type mapping files, splits the global node‑to‑partition assignments among processes, and exposes read‑only mappings for translating global node IDs to their partition IDs and to contiguous shuffled IDs within each node type and across partitions.
business_intent: Enable large‑scale graph processing frameworks to efficiently locate nodes across partitions and to use compact, shuffled identifiers for reduced communication overhead and balanced workload distribution.
